sentence.text: Individual 16 is a 3-year-old male with hypertelorism, hypotonia, and feeding difficulties requiring gastrostomy tube.
Infantile spasms began at 3 months of age and progressed to multi-drug resistant epilepsy (absence, myoclonic, and generalized tonic-clonic seizures).
Trio exome sequencing identified a de novo variant in POLR1A, c.4685G>T; p.
At age 3, he is non-verbal and is unable to sit independently.
His height is 86.7 cm (-2.28 SD) and his head circumference is 46.1 cm (<-2 SD).
He had an MRI which demonstrated peritrigonal high signal.
